entry.title: New release for Worklenz: v1.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Initial commit by @chamikaJ in https://github.com/Worklenz/worklenz/pull/3
  • Fix/migration remove by @chamikaJ in https://github.com/Worklenz/worklenz/pull/4
  • docs: updated SETUP_THE_PROJECT.md and removed secret files from .env by @chamikaJ in https://github.com/Worklenz/worklenz/pull/5
  • Development by @chamikaJ in https://github.com/Worklenz/worklenz/pull/6

New Contributors

  • @chamikaJ made their first contribution in https://github.com/Worklenz/worklenz/pull/3

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Worklenz/worklenz/commits/v1.0.0

entry.title: New release for Worklenz: v1.0.1
entry.content:
